name: Dragon Quest & Final Fantasy in Itadaki Street Portable
overview: Dragon Quest & Final Fantasy in Itadaki Street Portable is a modified conversion of Itadaki Street Special, including the numerous design changes and new modes from that title, along with the copious Dragon Quest and Final Fantasy fan service. This version includes a completely different, though slightly smaller, selection of maps compared to its console brother. The unlock system has been changed, and a new Quick Mode has been added that speeds up the game for portable play.
